title: Updated launcher is broken for me
body: Updated the launcher and now the game refuses to even launch past the initial League of Legends popup, PLEASE roll back this update or let us use an older version or SOMETHING, it launches, shows the splash screen, it vanishes and all .exes or anything in task manager stops, thanks.

replies.body: Ahhhh it sounds like your OS might not have the correct [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place. Without those permissions setup in the right way, your OS might not recognize League as safe and block it from running which is what sounds like might be happening.

I know how to get it to launch, you have to find the file location of the "LeagueClient" application. 

Located here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.86\deploy 

Go into your task manager and end the League of Legends in processes. Then just double click the "League Client" application (above)


I have also been experiencing a lot of delays in the client though. Like I try to make a Ranked Solo/Duo lobby, it takes like 10-15 seconds to make it and half the time it just says "something unexpected happened while trying to create your lobby"
